attributes.action: print a none of the above on a ballot paper
attributes.additional_details: Would like to see a "None of the above" option on ballot papers. This would allow ppl to use their vote that our ancestors so hard fought for and do away with apathy. These votes need to be counted in the current climate to  give justice to the current climate of how Britons feel. I, for one, would make the effort to vote, resistering a concern about all political parties. If the majority, then the UK sovereinty should take control, as before. A proper leadership.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: Abstaining

Created by: Brian Whicher

Closing: 30/03/2015
